prev.title: Outbound SMS: Creating a New Outbound SMS Campaign

next.title: Voice: Creating a New Voice Campaign

title: Voice: Interacting with a Voice Campaign
body:
Voice: Interacting with a Voice Campaign¶

outbound calls

  1. Click in the ribbon

  2. Click Campaigns

  3. Click Outbound SMS

  4. Click on a voice campaign to view details, an audit trail, and comments

  5. Click and click Edit Campaign

  6. Click and click Send/Schedule Campaign

  7. Click , Delete Campaign, and Yes to delete the campaign along with all associated workflows and performance data

  8. Click Emails to click on the emails associated with the voice campaign

  9. Click Performance to view recorded recipient interaction data

add ones for sent voice campaign
